me.lihq.game

Class GameSnapshot

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.lihq.game.GameSnapshot

  • public class GameSnapshot
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores all the vital information about a game state.

    Each player has one of these, storing the current state of their game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Map gameMap
      The game map
      int interactionsRemaining
      Count number of interactions remaining before switching to next player Set to -1 if in single player mode so that prompt to switch player is never shown PlayerSwitchScreen is shown if this = 0
      NPC killer
      An NPC object for the killer.
      java.util.List<NPC> NPCs
      A list holding NPC objects
      Player player
      A player object for the player of the game
      Puzzle puzzle
      This is the puzzle for this specific player
      NPC victim
      An NPC object for the victim.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameSnapshot(GameMain game, Map map, Player player, java.util.List<NPC> npcs, boolean isMultiPlayer)
      This constructor creates a GameSnapshot with the provided information
      GameSnapshot(GameSnapshot other)
      This constructor creates a GameSnapshot from another GameSnapshot Copying all the data to new spaces in memory

    • Field Detail

      • NPCs

        public java.util.List<NPC> NPCs
        A list holding NPC objects

      • gameMap

        public Map gameMap
        The game map

      • player

        public Player player
        A player object for the player of the game

      • puzzle

        public Puzzle puzzle
        This is the puzzle for this specific player

      • killer

        public NPC killer
        An NPC object for the killer. This allows us to easily access the name and room of the killer, without having to iterate through each NPC.

      • victim

        public NPC victim
        An NPC object for the victim. This allows us to easily access the name of the victim, without having to iterate through each NPC.

      • interactionsRemaining

        public int interactionsRemaining
        Count number of interactions remaining before switching to next player Set to -1 if in single player mode so that prompt to switch player is never shown PlayerSwitchScreen is shown if this = 0

      • GameSnapshot

        public GameSnapshot(GameMain game,
                    Map map,
                    Player player,
                    java.util.List<NPC> npcs,
                    boolean isMultiPlayer)
        This constructor creates a GameSnapshot with the provided information
        Parameters:
        game - - Reference to the GameMain instance
        map - - The map for the game
        player - - The player playing the game
        npcs - - List of NPCs in the maps

      • GameSnapshot

        public GameSnapshot(GameSnapshot other)
        This constructor creates a GameSnapshot from another GameSnapshot Copying all the data to new spaces in memory
        Parameters:
        other - - The GameSnapshot to copy

        Returns:
